DOC.brief_summary: This study assesses the maximum tolerated dose, overall safety and antitumor activity of SU011248 in combination with capecitabine in patients with advanced solid tumors
DOC.brief_title: A Study To Find The Best Doses Of SU011248 (Sunitinib) And Capecitabine When These Drugs Are Administered Together
DOC.criteria: Patients with diagnosis of a solid cancer which is not responsive to standard therapy or for which no standard therapy exists Patient has good performance status (ECOG 0 or 1) Prior treatment with either SU011248 or capecitabine. Hypertension that cannot be controlled by medications
DOC.keyword: solid tumor malignancy, SU011248, sunitinib, capecitabine, Phase 1
